resources.string: 33/47, Chhtrapati Shivaji Rd, Camp, Pune, Maharashtra 411001

World Digital Conclave App or WDC App is an endeavor to bring all the Digital Marketing and Technology Enthusiasts from across the globe together to share knowledge and grow together. Its first-of-a-kind app that focuses on MarTech space and has multiple groups specific to discussions on AI, IoT, Industry4.0, AR/ VR/ MR, SEO, PPC, Social Media, Content Marketing and more! The app also allows you to host or attend various online and offline events happening in the MarTech space. More features will keep getting added as the network grows.
